miscontent.title: 检查右发起动机碎片探测器CHECK RIGHT ENGINE STARTER CHIP DETECTOR

row.entry: TAA320-80-001关于禁止订购/接收或安装相关件号起动机的通知

reftitle.para: Opening of the Fan Cowl Doors
Closing of the Fan Cowl Doors

l2item.para: On the center pedestal, on the ENG panel 115VU:
在中央操纵台发动机面板115VU:

l3item.para: Put a WARNING NOTICE(S) to tell persons not to start the engine.
放置一个警告标牌以告戒他人不要启动发动机

l2item.para: Make sure that the engine 1(2) shutdown occurred not less than 5 minutes before you do this procedure.
执行程序前,确认发动机1(2)号已关车至少5分钟
On the overhead maintenance panel 50VU:
在头顶维护面板50VU

l3item.para: Make sure that the ON legend of the ENG/FADEC GND PWR/1(2) pushbutton switch is off.
确认ENG/FADEC GND PWR1/(2)按扭的ON灯灭
Put a WARNING NOTICE(S) to tell persons not to energize the FADEC 1(2).
放置警告牌告诫其他人员不要接通FADEC1(2)

l1item.para: 打开风扇包皮(参考.AMM TASK 71-13-00-010-040–B)

l2item.para: FOR 1000-EM-1 (ENGINE-1)
FOR 1000-EM-2 (ENGINE-2)

l1item.para: Removal of Starter Magnetic Plug for Inspection.
拆下起动机磁堵做检查

l2item.para: Remove the knurled magnetic plug (90) from oil drain plug (110):
从滑油放油塞(110)拆下带凸边的磁堵（90）

l3item.para: Push and turn counter-clockwise to release the plug (90).
按下并逆时针旋转以取出磁堵（90）

note.para: The oil drain plug (110) has a built-in check valve to permit removal of magnetic plug (90) without draining oil from the starter.

note-zh.para: 滑油放油塞（110）有一个内置的单向阀可以允许拆下磁堵（90）时起动机的滑油不会排出

l1item.para: Inspection of the Magnetic Plug Probe (90).

note.para: Before examination for metal particles, carefully prevent a further contamination of the magnetic plug probe by metal particles from the tool box or work area.

note-zh.para: 检查金属颗粒之前，防止工具箱或者工作区域的金属微粒对磁堵探头的污染

cqh-note.para: The below inspection criteria is customized by SPRING AIRLINES, which require to confirm the quantity of metal particles found

cqh-note-zh.para: 以下检查标准经过春秋客户化定义，要求对发现的金属颗粒数量进行确认

l2item.para: If no material found , perform the procedure C
如果没有材料在磁性探测器上，执行步骤C
If found the contaminants, examine the magnetic plug probe for the quantity and type of the contaminants. If the contaminanition you see on the probe looks important, do as follows:
如果发现有污染物的话，检查磁堵探头的污染物数量和种类，如果觉得污染物比较重要或者像金属颗粒的话，做以下步骤

note.para: Carbon and dirt may form sludge on the probe along with metal particles, and cause misleading appearance in the quantity of contamination.

note-zh.para: 碳和污物形成的污泥可能和磁堵探头中的金属颗粒混在一起，会导致错误判断金属颗粒的数量

l3item.para: Clean the probe with TISSUE PAPER and retain the removed particles.
用棉纸清洁磁堵探头并保留除下的颗粒
Examine the metallic contaminants under a MAGNIFYING GLASS POWER 10X. Use the inspection criteria which follow :
在10倍放大镜下检查金属污垢，用以下标准

l4item.para: A small accumulation powder-like particles,perform the procedure C.
少量的粉末状金属颗粒，执行步骤C
Fine slivers and relatively flat flakes metal particles less than 0.1 in. (2.54 mm) in any direction，and quantity less than 10，perform the procedure C
小长条状或小薄平状的金属颗粒，任何方向尺寸都不超过0.1 inch（2.54mm），且数量不超过10粒，执行步骤C

Fine slivers and relatively flat flakes metal particles less than 0.1 in. (2.54 mm) in any direction，and quantity more than 10,a starter replacement is necessary. (Ref. AMM TASK 80-11-10-000-002-A) and (Ref.AMM TASK 80-11-10-400-002-A).
小长条状或小薄平状的金属颗粒，任何方向尺寸都不超过0.1 inch（2.54mm），且数量超过10粒，必须更换起动机 (参考.AMM TASK 80-11-10-000-002-A) 和(参考.AMM TASK 80-11-10-400-002-A)

A larger accumulation of particles, or particles larger than 0.1 in. (2.54 mm) in any direction, show there is some internal damage and that a starter replacement is necessary. 05-21-50-200-001
05-21-50-200-001-A
and 05-21-50-200-001
05-21-50-200-001-A
大量的金属颗粒或任何方向尺寸超过0.1 in. (2.54 mm)的颗粒表示有一些内部损伤，必须更换起动机（参考AMMTASK 80-11-10-000-002-A) 和(参考. AMM TASK 80-11-10-400-002-A)

l1item.para: Installation of Magnetic Plug after Inspection.

cqh-note.para: The P/N of Seal must be confirmed before seal replacement. For starter P/N: 3505582-65、3505582-64、3505582-63, apply O-ring P/N M83248-1-008.
For starter P/N:3505582-27、3505582-28, apply O-ring P/N S3225-008.

cqh-note-zh.para: 在密封圈更换之前，须确认其件号：

l2item.para: Remove and discard the two O-rings (100).
拆下并丢掉两个O型封圈（100）

Lubricate two new
80111001-100 O-ring 100 with
CP2442 engine oil and put them on the knurled magnetic plug (90).
用发动机滑油(材料号P2442)润滑两个O型封圈(100)，安在凸边磁堵(90)上
Install the knurled magnetic plug (90) in oil drain plug (110):
安装磁堵（90）到放油塞上（110）

l3item.para: Push inward and turn clockwise to engage locking device.
往里压入并顺时针旋转锁定

l2item.para: Visually inspect make sure there are no signs of oil leakage from the starter housing. If you find oil leaks, replace the starter (Ref. AMM TASK 80-11-10-000-002) and (Ref. AMM TASK 80-11-10-400-002).
查看确定起动机外壳没有漏油迹象，如果发现漏油则更换起动机 (参考 AMM TASK 80-11-10-000-002)和(参考 AMM TASK 80-11-10-400-002)
Visually inspect make sure there are no signs of oil leakage between the starter housing and the items as follow:
查看确定起动机外壳和以下几个项目之间没有漏油迹象：
-Oil fill plug adapter (50)
滑油加注塞接头(50)
-Oil overflow plug adapter (60)
滑油溢流塞接头(60)
-Oil drain plug adapter (110)
滑油放油塞接头(110)

l3item.para: Oil leaks past these adapters could be caused by defective O-rings below them. If you see any oil leakage, replace the O-rings(Ref. CMM 80–11–37).
这些接头漏油可能是因为它们的 O 型封圈损坏，如果看到任何泄漏，更换该封圈(参 考CMM 80–11–37)

l2item.para: Visually make sure there are no oil leaks from the knurled oil fill plug (30) and the knurled overflow plug (80) and the knurled magnetic plug (90) of oil drain plug. If leaky, remove them and make sure:
查看确定滑油加注塞(30)、溢流塞(80)、滑油放油塞磁堵(90)没有漏油迹象，如果有， 拆下它们并确认：
-O-ring (40) is installed and/or is in good condition.
O 型封圈(40)有安装并完好无损。
-O-ring (70) is installed and/or is in good condition .
O 型封圈(70) 有安装并完好无损
-O-rings (100) are installed and/or are in good conditions. Install plugs (30) ,(80) , (90) by hand. Make sure of positive retention by their bayonet attachment system.
O 型封圈(100) 有安装并完好无损，用手来安装堵头(30) 、(80) 、(90)，确保堵头正 确安装到位
If no leakage found ,perform the following procedure:
如果没有渗漏，则执行随后步骤
Make sure that adapters (50) and (60) are correctly lockwired.
确定接头（50）和（60）打好保险
Make sure that the chains (or cables) which keep the plugs (30) and (80) are in place and in good condition.
确定连接堵盖（30）和（80）的链条在正确位置，并完好无损
Make sure of correct installation and positive retention of V-clamps (10) and (20).
确定 V 型卡子(10) 和 (20)正确安装并且有效

l1item.para:
Do the servicing of the starter, if necessary 05-21-50-200-001
05-21-50-200-001-A
如有必要，做起动机的勤务。(参考AMM TASK 12-13-80-610-001–C)

l2item.para: Make sure that the work area is clean and clear of tools and other items.
确定工作区域清洁并清点工具和其它项目
关闭风扇包皮(参考AMM TASK 71-13-00-410-040–B)
Remove the warning notice(s).
移走警告牌
